name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs the song 'Lost my music' on a vibrant stage.
Hakui Koyori performs '怪物' (Monster) in a gothic church-like setting with stylized on-screen lyrics.
Hakui Koyori performs '鳥の詩' (Bird's Poem) while sitting on a wall by the sea.

subtitles.original: Lost my music
subtitles.english: Lost my music

subtitles.original: ...そんな
subtitles.english: ...such a...

subtitles.original: ほらまた夜が生まれるから Good night!
subtitles.english: Look, the night is being born again, so good night!

subtitles.original: 大好きなひとが遠すぎ
subtitles.english: The person I love is too far away,

subtitles.original: 遠すぎて泣きたくなるの
subtitles.english: So far it makes me want to cry.

subtitles.original: きっと目が覚めてもまだ
subtitles.english: Even when I wake up, I'm sure I'll still...

subtitles.original: 幻を感じたい Morning
subtitles.english: ...want to feel the illusion in the morning.

subtitles.original: I still, I still I love you!
subtitles.english: I still, I still I love you!

subtitles.original: I'm waiting waiting forever
subtitles.english: I'm waiting waiting forever

subtitles.original: I still, I still I love you!
subtitles.english: I still, I still I love you!

subtitles.original: とまらないのよ
subtitles.english: It won't stop.

subtitles.original: I still, I still I love you!
subtitles.english: I still, I still I love you!

subtitles.original: I'm waiting waiting forever
subtitles.english: I'm waiting waiting forever

subtitles.original: I still, I still I love you!
subtitles.english: I still, I still I love you!

subtitles.original: また会えるよね
subtitles.english: We'll meet again, right?

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 怪物
subtitles.english: Monster

subtitles.original: 素晴らしき世界に今日も乾杯
subtitles.english: Cheers once again to this wonderful world.

subtitles.original: 街に飛び交う笑い声も
subtitles.english: Even the laughter echoing through the city...

subtitles.original: 見て見ぬフリしてるだけの作りもんさ
subtitles.english: It's all just a facade, everyone's just pretending not to see.

subtitles.original: 気が触れそうだ
subtitles.english: It's driving me crazy.

subtitles.original: クラクラするほどの良い匂いが
subtitles.english: A scent so sweet it makes me dizzy...

subtitles.original: ツンと刺した鼻の奥
subtitles.english: Pierces deep into my nose...

subtitles.original: 目を覚ます
subtitles.english: ...and wakes me up.

subtitles.original: 本能のまま
subtitles.english: Following my instincts,

subtitles.original: 今日は誰の番だ？
subtitles.english: Whose turn is it today?

subtitles.original: この世界で
subtitles.english: In this world,

subtitles.original: 何ができるのか
subtitles.english: What can I do?

subtitles.original: 僕には何ができるのか
subtitles.english: What am I capable of?

subtitles.original: ただその真っ黒な目から
subtitles.english: Just so that from those pitch-black eyes...

subtitles.original: 涙溢れ落ちないように
subtitles.english: ...tears won't overflow.

subtitles.original: 願う未来に何度でもずっと
subtitles.english: I'll keep hanging on tight to the future I wish for...

subtitles.original: 喰らいつく
subtitles.english: ...over and over again.

subtitles.original: この間違いだらけの
subtitles.english: In this world...

subtitles.original: 世界の中
subtitles.english: ...full of mistakes,

subtitles.original: 君には笑ってほしいから
subtitles.english: I want you to be able to smile.

subtitles.original: もう誰も傷付けない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get hurt anymore.

subtitles.original: 強く強くなりたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I want to become strong, so strong.

subtitles.original: 僕が僕でいられるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remain myself.

subtitles.original: 素晴らしき世界は今日も安泰
subtitles.english: The wonderful world is peaceful again today.

subtitles.original: 街に渦巻く悪い話も
subtitles.english: Even the bad rumors swirling through the city...

subtitles.original: 知らない知らないフリして目を逸らした
subtitles.english: I looked away, pretending not to know, not to know.

subtitles.original: 正気の沙汰じゃないな
subtitles.english: It's not a sane situation.

subtitles.original: 真面目に着飾った行進
subtitles.english: A march dressed in seriousness,

subtitles.original: 鳴らす足音が弾む行き先は
subtitles.english: The destination where the rhythmic footsteps lead is...

subtitles.original: 消えない消えない味が染み付いている
subtitles.english: A taste that never, never fades is stained in...

subtitles.original: 裏側の世界
subtitles.english: ...the world on the other side.

subtitles.original: 清く正しく生きること
subtitles.english: To live purely and justly,

subtitles.original: 誰も悲しませずに生きること
subtitles.english: To live without making anyone sad.

subtitles.original: はみ出さず真っ直ぐに生きること
subtitles.english: To live straight without straying,

subtitles.original: それが間違わないで生きること？
subtitles.english: Is that what it means to live without making mistakes?

subtitles.original: ありのまま生きることが正義か
subtitles.english: Is living as yourself justice?

subtitles.original: 騙し騙し生きるのは正義か
subtitles.english: Or is living by deception justice?

subtitles.original: 僕の在るべき姿とはなんだ
subtitles.english: What is the way I'm supposed to be?

subtitles.original: 本当の僕は誰何者なんだ
subtitles.english: Who am I really?

subtitles.original: 教えてくれよ
subtitles.english: Tell me.

subtitles.original: 教えてくれよ
subtitles.english: Tell me.

subtitles.original: 今日も答えのない世界の中で
subtitles.english: In this world without answers,

subtitles.original: 願ってるんだよ 不器用だけれど
subtitles.english: I'm still wishing today, clumsy as I am.

subtitles.original: いつまでも君とただ笑っていたいから
subtitles.english: Because I just want to keep laughing with you forever.

subtitles.original: 跳ねる心臓が
subtitles.english: My pounding heart...

subtitles.original: 体揺らし叫ぶんだよ
subtitles.english: ...shakes my body and screams.

subtitles.original: 今こそ動き出せ
subtitles.english: Move out now!

subtitles.original: 弱い自分を何度でもずっと
subtitles.english: I'll keep biting back at my weak self...

subtitles.original: 喰らいつく
subtitles.english: ...over and over again.

subtitles.original: この間違いだらけの世界の中
subtitles.english: In this world full of mistakes,

subtitles.original: 君には笑ってほしいから
subtitles.english: I want you to be able to smile.

subtitles.original: もう誰も泣かないよう
subtitles.english: So that no one has to cry anymore...

subtitles.original: 強く強くなりたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I want to become strong, so strong,

subtitles.original: 僕が僕でいられるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remain myself.

subtitles.original: ただ君を 守る そのために
subtitles.english: Just to protect you, for that purpose,

subtitles.original: 走る 走る 走るんだよ
subtitles.english: I run, I run, I'm running!

subtitles.original: 僕の中の 僕を超える
subtitles.english: I'll surpass the "me" inside of me.

subtitles.original: 鳥の詩
subtitles.english: Bird's Poem

subtitles.original: 消える飛行機雲
subtitles.english: We watched the vapor trails...

subtitles.original: 僕たちは見送った
subtitles.english: ...fade away.

subtitles.original: 眩しくて逃げた
subtitles.english: It was so bright I ran away,

subtitles.original: いつだって弱くて
subtitles.english: I was always so weak.

subtitles.original: あの日から
subtitles.english: Unchanged since...

subtitles.original: 変わらず
subtitles.english: ...that day.
